com.google.android.filament

类 Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.filament.Scene

  • public class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
    A Scene is a flat container of RenderableManager and LightManager components.

    A Scene doesn't provide a hierarchy of objects, i.e.: it's not a scene-graph. However, it manages the list of objects to render and the list of lights. These can be added or removed from a Scene at any time. Moreover clients can use TransformManager to create a graph of transforms.


    A RenderableManager component must be added to a Scene in order to be rendered, and the Scene must be provided to a View.

    Creation and Destruction

    A Scene is created using Engine.createScene() and destroyed using Engine.destroyScene(Scene).
    另请参阅:
    View, LightManager, RenderableManager, TransformManager

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSkybox

        public Skybox getSkybox()
        返回:
        the Skybox or null if none is set
        另请参阅:
        setSkybox(Skybox)

      • setSkybox

        public void setSkybox(Skybox skybox)
        Sets the Skybox. The Skybox is drawn last and covers all pixels not touched by geometry.
        参数:
        skybox - the Skybox to use to fill untouched pixels, or null to unset the Skybox.

      • getIndirectLight

        public IndirectLight getIndirectLight()
        返回:
        the IndirectLight or null if none is set
        另请参阅:
        setIndirectLight(IndirectLight)

      • setIndirectLight

        public void setIndirectLight(IndirectLight ibl)
        Sets the IndirectLight to use when rendering the Scene. Currently, a Scene may only have a single IndirectLight. This call replaces the current IndirectLight.
        参数:
        ibl - the IndirectLight to use when rendering the Scene or null to unset.

      • addEntity

        public void addEntity(int entity)
        Adds an Entity to the Scene.
        参数:
        entity - the entity is ignored if it doesn't have a RenderableManager component or LightManager component.
        A given Entity object can only be added once to a Scene.

      • addEntities

        public void addEntities(int[] entities)
        Adds a list of entities to the Scene.
        参数:
        entities - array containing entities to add to the Scene.

      • removeEntity

        public void removeEntity(int entity)
        Removes an Entity from the Scene.
        参数:
        entity - the Entity to remove from the Scene. If the specified entity doesn't exist, this call is ignored.

      • remove

        @Deprecated
public void remove(int entity)
        已过时。 See removeEntity(int)

      • removeEntities

        public void removeEntities(int[] entities)
        Removes a list of entities from the Scene. This is equivalent to calling remove in a loop. If any of the specified entities do not exist in the scene, they are skipped.
        参数:
        entities - array containing entities to remove from the Scene.

      • getEntityCount

        public int getEntityCount()
        Returns the total number of Entities in the Scene, whether alive or not.
        返回:
        the total number of Entities in the Scene.

      • getRenderableCount

        public int getRenderableCount()
        Returns the number of active (alive) RenderableManager components in the Scene.
        返回:
        number of RenderableManager components in the Scene.

      • getLightCount

        public int getLightCount()
        Returns the number of active (alive) LightManager components in the Scene.
        返回:
        number of LightManager components in the Scene.

      • hasEntity

        public boolean hasEntity(int entity)
        Returns true if the given entity is in the Scene.
        返回:
        Whether the given entity is in the Scene.

      • getNativeObject

        public long getNativeObject()

      • getEntities

        public int[] getEntities(int[] outArray)
        Returns the list of all entities in the Scene. If outArray is provided and large enough, it is used to store the list and returned, otherwise a new array is allocated and returned.
        参数:
        outArray - an array to store the list of entities in the scene.
        返回:
        outArray if it was used or a newly allocated array.
        另请参阅:
        getEntityCount()

      • getEntities

        public int[] getEntities()
        Returns the list of all entities in the Scene in a newly allocated array.
        返回:
        an array containing the list of all entities in the scene.
        另请参阅:
        getEntityCount()

      • forEach

        public void forEach(Scene.EntityProcessor entityProcessor)
        Invokes user functor on each entity in the scene. It is not allowed to add or remove an entity from the scene within the functor.
        参数:
        entityProcessor - User provided functor called for each entity in the scene
